attributes.description:
Well looked after! Economical Family Vehicle!

Full Service History with Agents, Urban Line, Media Interface, Bluetooth, Cruise Control, Multi Function Steering, Park Distance Control, Alloy Wheels, Spare Key, Electric Windows, Xenon Headlights, Daytime Running Lights.

DEKRA Roadworthy.
Finance & Insurance can be arranged. (T's & C's) 
We are an approved MFC, Wesbank & Standard Bank dealer.
Trade-ins accepted.
Mechanical Warranty Available.
Contact us for more information regarding this vehicle or simply complete the contact form and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
George Auto - Miles of Smiles

attributes.description:
This is the best Toyota Hilux Single Cab 2013. Everything from the chassis to the body shell, the interior design, engines are not all-new but get improvements of their own for improved drive ability, fuel efficiency and comfort. 

This vehicles come with Extra Features :
Power Steering, Drink Holder, Towbar, Cd Player, Media Interface & Rear Wheel Drive/All Wheel Drive .

Stunning both in and out. Comes with valid AA reports
5% DISCOUNT on all cash deals. For all purchases within 5days, we’ll throw in full tank petrol/diesel, or a full vacuum. 

Financed vehicle are charged at an addition R40 000, require a 10% upfront deposit, and an additional R1990 administrative fee.

Contact numbers for anytime 
JACOB 068 188 7445 
LERATO 067 677 3735 
Lufuno 076 381 2346 
Thabiso 079 667 3592
